description:
Through this course you will discover everything you need to know about the process of setting up your new Limited Company in the UK.

This course will take you on a journey covering all of the important decisions you have to make about your Company including:

  • Checking the structure is right for your business
  • How to choose your name and ensure it is available
  • Responsibilities of the Directors and Company Secretaries
  • Alloting shares
  • How to register with HMRC
  • The annual filing requirements

You will also be shown a walkthrough about how to actually set up your Limited Company from the Companies House website.
title: How To Set Up A Limited Company In The UK
